title: Fix manual dispatch for Discord workflow
author: Itachi-1824

gist.headline: Fixing the messenger
gist.blurb: Even the bees delivering the news need a map sometimes. Fixed manual dispatch for our Discord bot.
gist.summary: Updated the Discord notification script to fetch PR details via API when environment variables are missing during manual dispatch.
gist.impact: Developers can now manually trigger PR announcements without the workflow crashing.
gist.visual_concept: A bee mechanic fixing a small retro robot messenger or a broken megaphone. Represents the fix to the notification system.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a bee mechanic fixing a small retro robot messenger. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting. Lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.
